metadata.title: CVE-2021-26713 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in res_rtp_asterisk.c in Sangoma Asteriskbefore 16.16.1, 17.x before 17.9.2, and 18.x before 18.2.1 and CertifiedAsterisk before 16.8-cert6 allows an authenticated WebRTC client to causean Asterisk crash by sending multiple hold/unhold requests in quicksuccession. This is caused by a signedness comparison mismatch.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
